Bio

I am 27 years old married man, who got inspired in web technology and dedicated himself in web development for the past 3 years with self-training in php development, SQL commands, JavaScript, jQuery, WordPress, Html, CSS, SASS. I managed to accomplished different website design projects for: shifONE, Web Africa, 1-grid former gridhost in WordPress from start to finish and also have accomplished own project in WordPress theme development, car sharing with (php, MySQL, google map API, bootstrap) I have managed to create a CMS system like WordPressetc. I am a self-motivated man and always willing to learn new technology. I am a team worker and have a sense of responsibility and ready to help. I believe in myself and others skills and stand to face any challenge
